channel.title: BET on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in BET on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: David Ellison Confirms BET Networks No Longer for Sale During Media Q&A With Paramount Skydance Leaders
item.description: BET Networks is no longer being shopped to third-party buyers, the new leadership regime at Paramount Skydance confirmed Wednesday as top executives gathered for a wide-ranging Q&A with journalist
